name: Pacific Synergy Pte Ltd
description:
CommzGate is the #1 messaging engagement platform in Singapore. We enable you to increase revenue and productivity by engaging customers and employees over SMS, Push and WhatsApp using our Web Portal and API. Advanced features include closed loop customer engagement, conversational AI chat, emergency call tree alerts and 100% delivery for One-Time Passwords.
Our platform is ISO-27001 certified for security and used by global brands and  government agencies.
https://www.commzgate.com
focus_areas: Customer Engagement via SMS, Push and WhatsApp enhanced by AI Chat
Intelligent One-Time Password delivery over SMS, Push and WhatsApp
Emergency Call Tree Alerts over SMS, Push, Voice Call and WhatsApp
